Articles.Content:
Hello,

Perhaps some sort of stress system for launch pad clamps could be implemented? Right now, I don't really think it's very realistic to be able to balance an entire 500t+ ship on a single launch clamp without any sort of stress. A system could be implemented where physics is applied to the clamps, allowing them to stretch, bend, and break, as well as allowing them to share the load of heavier ships with other clamps. Different types of clamps could also be added for heavier/lighter weights with corresponding prices.

-FCI
